name: SpeakApps OER
short_description: The Open Educational Resources (OER) repository, is application where teachers will be able to find a growing amount of activities and experiences to be carried out in their classrooms. Moreover, and since the repository is build in a wiki environment, users will be able to actively contribute to the project by modifying and adapting activities to their needs. OER includes activities available in all SpeakApps languages that can be carried out with the project’s tools: Langblog, Tandem and Videochat. All the activities are openly licensed and have been developed to enhance oral production and interaction among language learners. Do not hesitate, check OER and help us grow the SpeakApps community!
